name: Hero's Journey (itch) (Designed By Jonas)
description:
Hero’s Journey is a first-person shooter (FPS) which follows a low poly art style. The goal of the game is to light up the world and traverse through wide platforms in order to reach the enchanted griffon and defeat it to save the world from beast’s terror.

The development of the game was an introduction to working in the unreal engine and was made to showcase my ability to design a level by taking into account player psychology through understanding how to utilize lighting and environmental design. This game was made in collaboration with an unreal engine game developer, Ahmed Yassin, who supplied the blueprints and visual effects for the game.

Recommended Specifications

Operating System: MacOS

Processor: Quad Core Intel Core i7

Memory: 8 GB RAM

Graphics Card: AMD Radeon Pro 570
